message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers a lot of value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but $14,000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay right now.  I'm happy to consider buying it for $11,000.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but $14,000 is already a competitive price.  Could you do $12,500? I'm confident you'll see a return on this investment.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,500 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. Let's split the difference - I'm willing to pay $11,500.  This is my final offer.
